experiment_name: Enantioselective intermolecular benzylic C-H amination catalysed by an engineered iron-haem enzyme
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:room temperature (23°C);    reaction_ph:8.0;    reaction_other_conditions:anaerobic conditions, whole E. coli cells (OD600 = 30), 25 mM glucose, oxygen depletion system (14,000 U/mL catalase, 1,000 U/mL glucose oxidase), 16-20 h reaction time, 40 rpm shaking;    reaction_substrate_concentration:5 mM alkane, 5 mM tosyl azide
